Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-47279 affecting package nodejs for versions less than 20.14.0-8
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-47279 affecting package nodejs for versions less than 20.14.0-8. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs is earlier than 20.14.0-8, affected by CVE-2025-47279
